name: Aristotle
description: Ancient Greek philosopher and polymath. A student of Plato and teacher of Alexander the Great. His writings cover a vast range of subjects, including physics, biology, zoology, metaphysics, logic, ethics, aesthetics, poetry, theater, music, rhetoric, psychology, linguistics, economics, politics, and government.
